name: The Barovia Project (Demo)
description:
The Barovia Project is an unofficial (Work in Progress) fan recreation of a part of Barovia, fully explorable in first person view.

Disclaimer! This is a very early version of the Project, there is nothing to do apart from hicking your way up to the castle at the moment. There are still a lot of placeholders, bugs, and many rough and/or empty areas. We will be improving the experience over time.

(Note that the Project will stay free, but donations are always welcome, and will be reinjected into the project's development. Please make sure it runs well on your machine before donating!)

More info here:

https://www.facebook.com/groups/2788408098102336

https://discord.com/channels/889629024882671697/969709559683883079
